sentences.en: The archbishop has sounded a warning to world leaders on third world debt.
sentences.cn: 大主教已经发出警告提醒世界领导人注意第三世界的债务。

sentences.en: Archbishop Hunthausen also vocalized his beliefs that women and homosexuals should be more active in the church.
sentences.cn: 大主教亨特豪森也阐述了他的想法：妇女和同性恋者应更积极地参与教堂事务。

sentences.en: The question is, what did the archbishop find?'
sentences.cn: 问题是，大主教发现的是什么？
